price: Sabõda haka ku ci daga abin da aka ambaci sũnan Allah* kansa, idan kun kasance mãsu ĩmãni da ãyõyinSa.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كُنتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: * An sani daga nan cewa ambaton sũnan Allah wajen yankan dabba wãjibi ne, idan an tuna. Wanda ya manta, anã cin yankansa, amma wanda ya bari da gangan, bã zã a ci yankansa ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā dhukira us'mu al-lahi ʿalayhi in kuntum biāyātihi mu'minīna
